XIV.4.B.3.d
.
Prohibition of Releasing FTI to a Member of Congress
Do not release FTI to a Member of Congress.  If a Congressional inquiry is received as a result of a proposal to reduce or terminate benefits or after benefits have been reduced or discontinued, inform the Member of Congress that
the beneficiary’s benefits have been reduced or discontinued, or VA is proposing to reduce or discontinue benefits because of a change in family income, and
IRC 6103
prohibits VA from releasing tax return information, but VA has provided the beneficiary with complete information concerning the reduction or termination or the proposed reduction or discontinuance.
Note
:  The exact amount of reduction may be furnished.
